function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spreading of disinformation through social media and mainstream media","Impact":"Erosion of public trust, misinformation leading to incorrect public health behaviors","Mitigation":"Fact-checking, promoting reliable sources, educating the public on critical evaluation of information","Technologies":"AI algorithms for content moderation, social media monitoring tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Social media platforms, news organizations"},{"Description":"Pitfalls of pandemic publishing raising questions about peer-review processes, scientific integrity, and data fraud","Impact":"Decreased reliability of published research, potential for flawed or fraudulent data to influence public health decisions","Mitigation":"Enhanced transparency in peer-review processes, promotion of open-science practices, measures to ensure scientific integrity","Technologies":"Blockchain for transparent data sharing, AI systems for detecting data fraud","People":"Academic researchers, scientific journals","Owner":"Academic institutions, scientific journals"},{"Description":"Amplification of flawed trial data through unreliable meta-analyses","Impact":"Misleading conclusions, erroneous influence on public health policies and treatments","Mitigation":"Scrutiny of meta-analyses, verification of trial data, robust statistical analysis","Technologies":"Data validation tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Researchers, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory bodies"}]}
